My friend Ryo was bored at work today.  He came by to chill for a bit, and proved to be a hit-parade of quotes.

(first thing he said when he walked in):
Ryo: Attention big beautiful women.

(then roy edwards comes by to chill out)
Ryo: Hey Roy.  Want to look at these porno ads in this magazine with me?
Ryo: Are these hookers?  Who are these guys?

-n

I'm not the best technical speaker. Actually my papers are pretty decent, because I can draft and redraft over and over. But as for public speaking, I can't present thoughts coherently and can't think on my feet. I'm giving a talk today, and a friend was giving me some advice. It follows: 
just imagine that you are Bustah Rhymes
and you just don't give a fuck
actually, you don't even like your audience.
they are a bunch of wanna be MCs who can't hold a mic right
and you intend to bring the pain

remember this, forever:  YAW YAW YAW YAW YAW, YAW YAW YAAAAAAW
-n

Almost a year ago I made the following post announcing my departure from the software department.

http://nogbogfrog.livejournal.com/204921.html

Well starting on the 5th, I will be rejoining the software department.  It was an interesting experiment in a different development and production environment.  It helped me realize what I liked in terms of tech, and in terms of teamwork.  I am going back to the software department with a lot of knowledge gained, and plenty of understanding about myself.  I am going back happily!

-n

I'm having a tough time with some personal stuff.  Please feel free to send me email, get back in touch, and help distract me.

Thanks!

-n

A college class was told they had to write a short story in as few words as possible.  The instructions were: The story had to contain the following 3 things:

1. Religion
2. Sexuality
3. Mystery

The A+ submission was:

"Good God, I'm pregnant; I wonder who did it"

-n

Some pictures from Dhaka.
Bangladesh Trip 2007

Look! You can buy some U-238 on the cheap from Amazon. The reviews on the product are excellent. Following the "also viewed" suggestions also reveals some interesting links. For example the Badonkadonk land cruiser/tank. And as Ashley points out Fresh, whole thumper. Fascinating! -n

Point number one:  I've completely lost track of days.  This happens whenever I fly more than halfway across the world.  Which brings me to my second point:  I'm in Bangladesh.  We arrived yesterday evening.

The primary purpose of my visit is to spend time with my grandmother.  There are also 2 weddings to attend.  Bengali weddings have a lot of pomp and circumstance attached.  A wedding really refers to the entire host of events, anywhere from 4 to 6.  A lot of the family has come back to Bangladesh for these 2 weddings.  So it's fun to see many cousins I haven't seen in an age.

Will post pictures soon!

-n
